bike.description: OCLV2 Carbon, KVF (Kammtail Virtual Foil) tube design, SC Speed Box & DuoTrap compatible, includes SC Draft Box

components.description: Bontrager SC, OCLV2 Carbon, KVF leg design, integrated brake and stem
SRAM Red R2C, bar end control, 10 speed
Bontrager Speed Concept Race X Lite, carbon, +/-10mm offset
Bontrager Speed Concept aero bar w/ski bend extension, carbon, direct mount
Integrated, sealed bearings, proprietary top, 1" bottom
Bontrager Speed Concept integrated brakes w/Bontrager Race XXX Lite aero levers
Rear Draft Box w/Draft Bag inside; 1-1/8" steerer stub
